articles.author: Fergal Bowers
articles.title: Latest coronavirus case brings total to 19 in Republic
articles.description: One more confirmed case of Covid-19 has been reported by the National Public Health Emergency Team. It brings the total number of confirmed cases in the Republic of Ireland to 19.
articles.content:
One more confirmed case of Covid-19 has been reported by the National Public Health Emergency Team.
It involves a male in the East of the country who returned from Italy.
It brings the total number of confirmed cases in the Republic of Ireland to 19.
The c… [+2400 chars]

articles.author: RTÉ News
articles.title: Death toll from coronavirus in Italy reaches 233
articles.description: Italy's death toll from the novel coronavirus rose by 36 to 233 on Saturday while the number of infections shot up by a single-day record of 1,247 to hit 5,883.
articles.content:
Italy's death toll from the novel coronavirus rose by 36 to 233 on Saturday while the number of infections shot up by a single-day record of 1,247 to hit 5,883.
Italy has recorded the most deaths of any country outside China and the third-most Covid-19 infec… [+1456 chars]

articles.author: RTÉ News
articles.title: US announces 21 coronavirus cases on cruise ship
articles.description: In the US, 21 people on board a cruise ship stranded off the coast of San Francisco have tested positive for the coronavirus, while 28 new deaths connected to the virus have been reported in China.
articles.content:
In the US, 21 people on board a cruise ship stranded off the coast of San Francisco have tested positive for the coronavirus.
The vessel – the Grand Princess - had been linked to infections from an earlier voyage.
"Among those positive for coronavirus were … [+2524 chars]

articles.author: RTÉ Sport
articles.title: PSG match latest event hit by coronavirus
articles.description: Paris Saint-Germain's Ligue 1 game away to Strasbourg has been postponed following a "prefectural order" issued on Friday by the Grand Est region where Strasbourg are based.
articles.content:
Paris Saint-Germain's Ligue 1 game away to Strasbourg has been postponed following a "prefectural order" issued on Friday by the Grand Est region where Strasbourg are based.
